description: When a user tries to delete a volume that is attached to a VM using nova the user gets an "Unexpected Exception" error when the cinder extension fails with an InvalidInput exception. This is not particularly helpful for troubleshooting and the message is misleading for users.
title: Some cinder failures return '500' errors to users
